item.title: Superconductivity Research
item.description: This project delves into the groundbreaking research conducted on superconductivity, leading to the development of the BCS theory.

item.title: BCS Theory: The Foundation of Superconductivity
item.description: The BCS theory, named after Bardeen, Cooper, and Schrieffer, explains how electron pairs, known as Cooper pairs, form in a superconductor and enable it to conduct electricity without resistance.
